health_tech: HL7 standards for health information exchange

evidence.claim: Vigilant Medical Billing Services ensures HIPAA compliance in their operations, securing patient information.
The company utilizes X12 837 for electronic claim submissions in adherence to industry standards.
Vigilant engages with EHR systems for integrated medical billing.
Health information exchange is facilitated via HL7 standards in their billing services.

icp.icp_reason: Relevant health tech and focus on X12 transactions indicate ICP alignment.
